name: Tokyo Mirage Sessions™ ♯FE
description: Two worlds. One heroic destiny. Once there was a group of young people who had no idea of the awesome powers they possessed. Meanwhile, in another dimension, a collection of heroes had lost all purpose and sense of themselves. Now, that’s all about to change… In Tokyo Mirage Sessions ♯FE, a unique RPG for Wii U, budding stars of the stage and screen from Tokyo team up with legendary warriors from the world of Fire Emblem against the forces of darkness. - Aim for the top of the entertainment industry and protect the world in a stylish RPG - Explore Tokyo and delve into the creepy dungeons of the Idolasphere - Put on your best performance in over-the-top turn-based battles - Stay in touch with other characters, view maps and see battle stats on the Wii U GamePad Please note: Tokyo Mirage Sessions ♯FE is only available with Japanese voiceover and English on-screen text.
